name: Google Classroom (Dark Theme/Skin)
description: This is my first ever attempt at creating a theme for a website so it most likely won't look amazing at first. I have a bit of experience with CSS but I'm also partly learning as I go. Please be patient while I try to work it out!
additional_info:
This theme was originally made for Google Classroom!

Also, please tell me about anything that's broken/wrong so I can fix it. :)
